featured.text: Kareem let his forest grow naturally, without using fertilizers or insecticides.
the purchase of family-sized insecticide-treated mosquito nets costing $5 each.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於殺死昆蟲的化學物質。
definition.en_def: A chemical substance used to kill insects.
definition.example: Farmers often use insecticide to protect their crops from pests.
